channel.title: Projects on André Cavalcanti
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on André Cavalcanti

item.title: Stirling Car
item.description: This car was developed as a practice of thermodynamics during my graduation in mechanical engineering.

item.title: UAV support for external payload
item.description: During the time I worked at the Barreira do Inferno launch center my task was to develop an support for external payload to SPACEVANT, an Autonomous Unmanned Vehicle for scanning and data collection in areas of space missions.

item.title: Game development
item.description: I developed games for projects of the department of physiotherapy of UFRN using Unity and Leap Motion.
